Power BI for Intermediates

A step-by-step training guide on using Power BI, covering topics such as connecting to data sources, data preparation with Power Query, and modelling the data. The guide includes best practice methodologies and is written by Soheil Bakhshi (Microsoft MVP) and Bruce Anderson.

Key Concepts:

  • Connecting to Data Sources
  • Data Preparation with Power Query
  • Modelling the Data
  • Relationships in Data Modelling
  • Identifying Key Columns in Power Query
